actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To make technical amendments to the Veterans' Judicial Review Act.

summary.text: Veterans' Judicial Review Amendments of 1990 - Repeals certain provisions relating to decisions made by the Court of Veterans Appeals in veterans' benefits determinations. Authorizes the Chief Judge of the Court to annually summon the judges of such Court to a judicial conference in order to consider business of the Court and to improve the administration of justice within the Court's jurisdiction. Makes discretionary (currently mandatory) the return by the Court of books, records, and diagrams submitted to the Court as part of an administrative determination.

titles.title: To make technical amendments to the Veterans' Judicial Review Act.
